name: Zeebric
tag_list: mobile-commerce, mobile, mobile-engagement, customer-analytics, social-media, mobile-shopping, qr-code, mobile-marketing, saas, mobile-merchandising, nfc
overview:
Zeebric is technology company headquartered in Newport Beach, California which works on products and solutions for brands to connect and engage directly with their buyers skipping the middle distributors / retailers bringing them closer.

Zeebric’s QlikTag solution uses a patented technology that uses QR code hang tags, labels or NFC to enable buyers to instantly connect with the brand via the Zeebric cloud based Saas online platform on scanning the label with their smart phones. Buyer data, product data and other insights are directly sent to the brand through the platform which also enables the brand to directly connect with the buyer, engage them with mobile content, personalize marketing promotion, gather feedback, share additional product information, activate loyalty programs and essentially interact with the buyer.

The solution integrates customer insights, buyer data, buyer behavior, in store mobile marketing, customer engagement, customer loyalty and other elements to connect brands and buyers on a whole new level that points towards individual, personalized engagement and building relationships as opposed to brands targeting groups or markets.
